Marinade the pork using all the ingredients 3 hours + or overnight.
Now to cook: Heat the olive and sunflower oil (on a medium heat) in a wok.
Add the pork and cook for about 10 minutes. Stirring regularly.
Add the onion and lightly brown. Takes another 4-5 minutes.
In the mean time while the meat is cooking, fry the potatoes in a deep fat fryer, until golden and crispy.
Once the potatoes are done drain them and dab with kitchen roll. Lightly sprinkle with a pinch of garlic salt.
Add the potatoes to the wok and cook for a further 3-5 minutes.
Check seasoning and serve with a salad of your choice.
